item.description:
Due to the weather I have moved our mini golf event indoors, but keep activity the same. This location is not that far from the original location.  I had suggestions of pool and bowling and will be setting those up for future events. 

Let's play a round or 2 of Mini Golf at Monster Mini Golf then head over to Chili's for some drinks/dinner.

 

http://www.monsterminigolf.com/fran-ma-danvers/index.html

 

Please confirm or change your RSVP so I can provide the venue a headcount.

 

Today Thursday May 3 I am out of my office for work and unsure if I have internet access.  I will check emails tonight and have access tomorrow during the day.

 

I will post my phone # tomorrow so people can call me if lost on way to venue or something.  Again at a client today and cell will be off.

 

Will rebook Richardson's
item.name: Mini Golf and Margaritas
